author: MEG KINNARD
title: Crossing Trump: 2 SC Republicans take different approaches
description: FLORENCE, S.C. (AP) — Under pressure recently to prove her loyalty to Donald Trump, Rep. Nancy Mace traveled to New York to film a social media video outside Trump Tower reminding her South Carolina constituents that she was one of the former president's “ear…
